actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 96-534.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the printing of the report of the official visit by the Speaker's Delegation to the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.

summary.text: Directs the printing, as a House document, of the report on the official visit by the Speaker's United States House of Representatives delegation to the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics from April 13 through April 22, 1979. Directs the printing of 2,500 additional copies for the use of the Speaker.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the printing of the report of the official visit by the Speaker's Delegation to the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics.
